scripts.build:run: yarn run lint && yarn run tsc
scripts.build:ci: yarn run clear-build-artifacts && yarn run compile-d-ts-files && yarn run tsc --outDir ./dist-mjs && yarn run rename-js-to-mjs && yarn run tsc --module CommonJS --outDir ./dist-cjs && yarn run format-output-files
scripts.clear-build-artifacts: rm -rf dist dist-ts dist-cjs dist-mjs build
scripts.compile-d-ts-files: yarn run tsc --removeComments false --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationDir ./dist-ts && yarn run copy-d-ts-files && yarn run tsc:plain --project tsconfig.out.json
scripts.format-output-files:
find dist-ts -name '*.ts' -type f -exec sh -c "echo '/* eslint-disable */
/* eslint-enable prettier/prettier */'"' | cat - $1 > $1.tmp && mv $1.tmp $1' -- {} \; && eslint --no-eslintrc --config '.eslintrc.output.ts.cjs' --fix './dist-ts/**/*.ts' && eslint --no-eslintrc --config '.eslintrc.output.cjs' --fix 'dist-cjs/*js' 'dist-mjs/*js'
scripts.rename-js-to-mjs: find dist-mjs -name '*.js' -type f -exec sh -c 'for f in "$@"; do mv -- "$f" "${f%.js}.mjs"; done' -- {} +
